message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL

This paper proposes a new paradigm for product categorization in e-commerce platforms based on machine translation. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the Natural Language Processing (NLP) sub-category (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper uses machine learning algorithms for classification, which falls under Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Machine Learning (cs.LG), and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Finally, the paper also discusses the transformation of the taxonomy into a directed acyclic graph (DAG), which involves graph theory and could be related to Deep Learning (cs.DL).
